name: commit_units_rolling_heuristic
algorithm:
1. Classify units into must-run (due to min up/down times and shutdown ramp limits) and flexible units
  2. Compute feasible output ranges for must-run units considering ramp constraints
  3. If current load exceeds must-run capacity, activate flexible units by incremental cost order
  4. Dispatch load using merit order based on incremental costs within feasible ranges
  5. Handle over-generation by must-run units when load is below minimum possible output
